meanings.sent1: The nonhalogenated solution was safe for the environment.
meanings.sent2: The scientist preferred to use nonhalogenated materials in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The nonhalogenated paint was so bland, it made the walls look invisible!
meanings.sent4: Her nonhalogenated approach to problem-solving was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The nonhalogenated fabric felt smooth and pure against her skin.

meanings.definition: Describing a substance that does not have halogen elements.
meanings.sent1: The nonhalogenated compound was considered eco-friendly.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers are increasingly using nonhalogenated materials in their products.
meanings.sent3: The nonhalogenated shampoo left her hair looking like a shiny waterfall.
meanings.sent4: His nonhalogenated cooking style was a symphony of natural flavors.
meanings.sent5: The nonhalogenated plastic was as clear as glass, yet much stronger.
